```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#Install function courtesy of CSCI 349
my.install <- function(pkg){
  if (!(pkg %in% installed.packages()[,1])){
    install.packages(pkg)
  }
  return (require(pkg, character.only=TRUE))
}

```

## Baltimore Crime
### Initial Exploration

Let's begin by loading the three data files in.
We have data on: arrests, 911 calls, and victims
```{r importing data}
arrests <- read.csv("Data/BPD_Arrests.csv")
calls <- read.csv("Data/911_Calls_for_Service.csv")
victims <- read.csv("Data/BPD_Part_1_Victim_Based_Crime_Data.csv")
```
